name: Robo Drop
description:
Story:

You're a little robot who failed QA testing and have been dropped into the bowels of the factory for recycling. You need to collect parts to fool the QA gates and escape.

Controls:

Menu controls are arrow keys to move and enter to confirm.

You control your character with the arrow keys and space to jump.

Pressing esc will exit to the menu and pressing r will reset the level.
